org.kangspace.wechat.cache

接口 WeChatCacheOperator<T,V>

  • 所有已知实现类:
    AbstractRedisWeChatCacheOperator, AbstractWeChatCacheOperator, WeChatAccessTokenCache, WeChatJsApiTicketCache, WeWorkAccessTokenCache, WeWorkAppJsApiTicketCache, WeWorkJsApiTicketCache

    public interface WeChatCacheOperator<T,V>
     微信相关缓存接口
    从以下版本开始:
    2020/11/4 11:06
    作者:
    kango2gler@gmail.com
